mapper.select: SELECT pp.*, pem.name FROM PMSPROJECT pp, (SELECT * FROM PMSEMP pe, PMSMEMBER pm WHERE pe.eno = pm.mno) pem WHERE pem.mno = pp.mno

SELECT pp.*, TO_CHAR(pp.sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') sdatestr,TO_CHAR(pp.deadline,'yyyy/mm/dd') deadlinestr, pem.name FROM PMSPROJECT pp, (SELECT * FROM PMSEMP pe, PMSMEMBER pm WHERE pe.eno = pm.mno) pem WHERE pem.mno = pp.mno AND pem.pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pmsproject(pno, sdate, deadline, mno, detail) VALUES(pmsproject_seq.nextval,#{sdate},#{deadline}, #{mno},#{detail})
